lead_paragraph: Terry Smith, who resigned this year from the financial advisory group Collins Stewart, has been succeeding (and sometimes failing) on his own unconventional terms for years, The Financial Times reports.
snippet: Terry Smith, the former Collins Stewart chairman famous for his controversial calls, set up the new firm Fundsmith on Tuesday, intent on bringing his unconventional logic to the fund industry.

headline.main: Terry Smith Sets Up Fundsmith, His Own Firm

abstract: Terry Smith, the former Collins Stewart chairman famous for his controversial calls, set up the new firm Fundsmith on Tuesday, intent on bringing his unconventional logic to the fund industry.
